mapper.update: update party set parent_name = #{parent_name}, parent_address = #{parent_address}, title = #{title}, meetdate = #{meetdate}, count=#{count}, gender=#{gender},age=#{age},drinking=#{drinking},content=#{content},place_id=#{place_id} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from party where seq = #{value} order by seq desc
select count from party where seq=#{value}
select count(*) from party where writer=#{value} and status=1
select count(*) from partylist where CHATSEQ_PARENT=#{value}
select count(*) from partylist where chatseq_parent=#{seq} and participant = #{nickname}
select count(*) from party where place_id = #{place_id}
mapper.update: update party set status = 0 where seq = #{value}
mapper.select: select * from (select party.*, row_number() over(order by status desc, seq desc) as rnum from party) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from party where seq in (select chatSeq_parent from partylist where participant = #{value})
select count(*) from blacklist where chatSeq_parent= #{seq} and blocked = #{name}
mapper.update: update party set report = report+1 where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT p.seq, p.count as pull, (select count(*) from partylist where chatseq_parent = p.seq) as count from party p INNER join partylist l on p.seq = l.chatseq_parent where p.seq=#{value}
mapper.update: update party set status = 1 where seq = #{value}
